hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/217a98677483762f054636d359e8e485.png)

We can take apart $\green{9}$ to make $\pink5$ and $\blue4$.  
We can put together $\pink5$ and $\blue4$ to make $\green9$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$9-5=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $5=9$
